name: Looney
intro: Looney was a warm patch of sunlight in every room — patient paws, curious eyes, and a tail that never forgot how to wag for her people. This page is a small home for her stories, her photos, and the love she left in all of us.

portrait.title: A heart the size of a sky
portrait.body: The last time when she smiled!

favorites.title: Favorite Things
favorites.subtitle: A quick list of the little joys that made her light up.

legacy.title: Her Legacy
legacy.quote: “We learned patience from her quiet wait at the door, joy from her morning spins, and gratitude from every gentle nudge.”
legacy.keepsakeBody: Add a scanned paw print, a favorite collar photo, or a note from your vet here.

footer.secondary: Replace names, dates, and memories to personalize.
